message: Let's split it 50/50 and be done with it!
You can have a smaller share, but I'll still be the richer one!
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're getting desperate, but I'm still in control!
I'll give you a bigger share, but I'm not going to get left with nothing!
You're getting close to being left with nothing, but I'm feeling generous... for now!
I'll give you most of it, but I'm not going to give up yet!
You're running out of options, and I'm not getting any softer!

You're getting desperate, and I'm taking advantage of it!
I'm not accepting any more of your offers, I'm taking a stand and refusing to give in!
You've pushed me to the wall, but I'm willing to give you the whole thing. Congratulations, you win!
